column5: For any who frequent the old canal in Welland. They started raising the water. First 20' of ice is submerged and soft. Making it unsafe the next few days. There was supposed to be a Heart & Stroke derby on Saturday, but I believe they will either have to change venue or scratch. It will take a few nights for that ice to firm up.
Update  Venue move to Rennie Park in Pt Dalhousie, Sat Feb 26th.
